channel.title: How i make it so u can only do starter once?

item.title: How i make it so u can only do starter once?
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

Add this public int:

public int starter = 0;

Then add this to your commands:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) { if (starter == 0) { addItem(1037, 1); addItem(1038, 1); addItem(1040, 1); addItem(1042, 1); addItem(1044, 1); addItem(1046, 1); addItem(1048, 1); addItem(1050, 1); addItem(1053, 1); addItem(1055, 1); addItem(1057, 1); addItem(1419, 1); addItem(995, 500000); sendMessage("This is your starter pack. Enjoy your time here on SERVER NAME"); starter = 1; } else if (starter == 1) { sendMessage("You have already received your starter pack!"); }

This is my version, you can change the “add item” to what you want them to spawn if you like. Change the SERVERNAME to the name of your server.

This just allows you to use ::starter once.

Enjoy.

Read full topic
item.source: How i make it so u can only do starter once?
